page.title: 05MECHANISATION IN ESKDALEMUIR
page.content: The impact of mechanisation upon the mind of the young farmer can be shown by the following commentry.Asked to talk about his daily duties he profferred the following information ."Lorries move livestock and fodder carry lime from stores to lime spreader,spread fertiliser evenly to restore nutrient to impoverished soil. The JCB front loader digger loads large quantities, scrapes top soil from chosen sites for house or shed foundation . With the correct attachement it lifts iron girders for shed structure. The buck hoe assists the balance of the machine,making it more flexible for cleaning drains and trenches for water pipes. Snow ploughs and gritters combined with lorry or tractor keep roads open.".Not a word concerning his part in this .The machine is the master.
